page.title: 06MOORSHOLM CLUBS & ACTIVITIES
page.content:
There are several locations in which clubs are based i.e.
{VILLAGE MEMORIAL HALL}Badminton Club, W.I. Mother & Toddlers, Young Farmers, Dances, Discos, Children's entertainment, table tennis. {ATHLETIC CLUB}Football, cricket, Guisborough Gun Club (pistols), darts, quoits, pool & table-tennis All these teams play in their various leagues. {IN HOMES}Ladies craft afternoon. {CONSERVATIVE ASSOCIATION}The Lockwood Conservative Assn. - meet in homes. {OTHER ACTIVITIES}Many villagers take part in the following, some of which take place outside the village. Whist drives, bridge, horse riding, jogging. Some village farmers take part in sheepdog trials. Youth Club, Brownies
